main

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the "Polynomial" class. This class is about writing a polynomial using the terms. It uses the class "Term". 1. It has two fields. 2. It has six methods.
    Author:
    Vijay Chaudhary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial()
        This is the constructor of the class. It creates an empty ArrayList with each element of type "Term". I am using a generic ArrayList here.

    • Method Detail

      • Insert

        public void Insert(int X,
                   int Y)
        This is the "Insert" method. It takes two parameters, the coefficient and the exponent for the terms of a polynomial. It takes those two parameters of a term, creates a term and insert those terms in an ascending order of exponent.
        Parameters:
        X - = Coefficient
        Y - = Exponent

      • Delete

        public void Delete(int X,
                   int Y)
        This is the Delete method. It takes two parameters, the coefficient and the exponent of a term. Here, I am looking for a matching term for given coefficient and exponent, and removing it from the list. I am using built-in method "remove" to remove the given term. If there is no such term, then this method throws a message.
        Parameters:
        X - = coefficient
        Y - = exponent

      • GetPolynomial

        public java.lang.String GetPolynomial()
        This is GetPolynomial method. It simply forms a proper polynomial and prints it on the screen. For eg: (1, 2), (3, 4) are the two terms of polynomial with (coeff, exp), then it returns x^2 + 3x^4. The return type is String.
        Returns:
        polynomial

      • Product

        public java.lang.String Product()
        This is Product method. It simply returns the product of terms of a polynomial in String type.
        Returns:
        product_value

      • Reverse

        public java.lang.String Reverse()
        This is Reverse method. It reverses the ascending ordered polynomial to descending order. It has a String return type.
        Returns:
        Reverse_polynomial
